1110111010010010 1100011100011110 1 -> sum: 1011010110110001, cout: 1
0101000101010011 0001010010010011 0 -> sum: 0110010111100110, cout: 0
1110110011111010 0101010010000100 0 -> sum: 0100000101111110, cout: 1
0000001101010110 1010110000111111 1 -> sum: 1010111110010110, cout: 0
1011110110101010 0110001010000000 0 -> sum: 0010000000101010, cout: 1
1011000001010001 0100001111111001 1 -> sum: 1111010001001011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
